hints.label: lem-drift-condition-corrected
hints.title: Drift Condition with Quadratic Lyapunov
hints.content:
2566: :label: lem-drift-condition-corrected
2567: 
2568: Under Assumptions A1 (confinement) and A3 (friction), there exist constants $a, b, c > 0$ such that the quadratic Lyapunov function:
2569: 
2570: $$
2571: V(x,v) = a|x|^2 + 2b x \cdot v + c|v|^2
2572: 
2573: $$
2574: 
2575: satisfies a drift condition with respect to the **adjoint operator** $\mathcal{L}^*$:
2576: 
2577: $$
2578: \mathcal{L}^*[V] \le -\beta V + C
2579: 
2580: $$
hints.raw_directive:
2563: Moreover, the simple Lyapunov $V = |x|^2 + |v|^2$ does NOT satisfy a drift condition due to the cross-term $x \cdot v$. We need a **quadratic form** that handles this coupling.
2564: 
2565: :::{prf:lemma} Drift Condition with Quadratic Lyapunov
2566: :label: lem-drift-condition-corrected
2567: 
2568: Under Assumptions A1 (confinement) and A3 (friction), there exist constants $a, b, c > 0$ such that the quadratic Lyapunov function:
2569: 
2570: $$
2571: V(x,v) = a|x|^2 + 2b x \cdot v + c|v|^2
2572: 
2573: $$
2574: 
2575: satisfies a drift condition with respect to the **adjoint operator** $\mathcal{L}^*$:
2576: 
2577: $$
2578: \mathcal{L}^*[V] \le -\beta V + C
2579: 
2580: $$

hints.label: thm-exponential-tails
hints.title: Exponential Tails for QSD
hints.content:
2759: :label: thm-exponential-tails
2760: 
2761: Under Assumptions A1-A4, the QSD $\rho_\infty$ satisfies:
2762: 
2763: $$
2764: \rho_\infty(x,v) \le C e^{-\alpha(|x|^2 + |v|^2)}
2765: 
2766: $$
2767: 
2768: for some constants $\alpha, C > 0$ depending on $\gamma$, $\sigma^2$, $\kappa_{\text{conf}}$, and $\kappa_{\max}$.
